pr_title: [BEAM-9262] Clean-up endpoints.proto to a stable state

timeline.bodyText: I assume this proto message isn't in common use yet, right? Because changing the field number seems risky otherwise.
timeline.author: youngoli

replies.bodyText:
Externally we will be consistent but I'll need to ensure that within Google I renumber this field atomically which I'm working on.
Many of our internal usages also rely on the textual version of the proto and not the binary version.
replies.author: lukecwik

timeline.message:
[BEAM-9262] Clean-up endpoints.proto to a stable state

Move authentication to follow the urn + payload method of specification.

[BEAM-9262] Clean-up endpoints.proto to a stable state

Move authentication to follow the urn + payload method of specification.
